CDX Format Examples

These examples show the contents and hierarchies of cdx files of varying complexity.

Empty.cdx - an empty cdx file

Carbon.cdx - a single carbon atom

CBondC.cdx - two carbon atoms connected by a single bond

CBondCTxt.cdx - two carbon atoms connected by a single bond with a text caption

CBndCNMR.cdx - two carbon atoms connected by a single bond, some text and a computed NMR spectrum

BrEthanePMR.cdx - a 1H NMR spectrum of bromoethane
